elements.innerHtml: ✓ One Fixed Price ✓ No Upfront Payments  ✓ Gas Safe Approved ✓ 10 Year Warranty on Boilers ✓ Next Day installation ✓ No-Sub Contractors ✓ Price Match Guarantee

Boiler Playing Up?

Get A New Boiler Installed within 24-48 Hrs
with Covid Safe Installation

No Site Visit Needed Our intelligent
System will work it out for you.
Getting your out from freezing to heating in just 24 hrs & all that at fixed and fair price without any salespeople involved. This is how we do it.

ANSWER FEW SIMPLE QUESTIONS

Comparing Prices?

Our Boilers Fit Every Budget


We are confident that our offers fit every budget. But still, if you have a better offer Lets save your time, we will match or beat any like for like quote by £50 or by offering better material or services on our product.

Planning to Replace your Radiators too?

Hold on to your hats! We can even arrange Radiator up-gradation during your new boiler installation. We fit all types of designer or standard radiators on new or existing locations with unbeatable prices

Seeing is Believing

Don't just take our word for it..

We believe in our engineers and their flawless top-quality workmanship, So there is nothing to hide. They deliver what we promise, completing all type of installations hassle and mess free and all that within a day.

We Protect Your New Boiler Too..

We have partnered with the most reliable brands in the market. As responsible engineers we fit best heating controls & protect the new boiler with best chemicals & system filters to keep your new system healthy and running great for many years.
~ Preview ~
~ Preview ~
~ Preview ~

Great News

Our Engineers have been vaccinated & are all set to carry out a safe installation in your home. We didn’t compromise your safety in the past and neither we intend to do it now, so they’ll wear the necessary PPE Kit, keep appropriate distance while having any conversation and ensures the area they use is disinfected before leaving.
Here is How We Give You More Than Boilers.

NO UPFRONT PAYMENTS, NO HIDDEN COSTS,

No hidden costs, pay on completion, everything is included. No salespeople involved ensures all savings are passed to you.

GAS SAFE APPROVED COMPANY

All installations are carried out by our in-house team of Gas-safe approved engineers. We don't use sub-contractors.

PEACE OF MIND

Get a 10-year warranty on top-quality A-rated boilers, 24/7 support with 365 days a year online order placement facility.

AFFORDABLE & EASY TO ORDER

All our boilers are A-rated for energy efficiency & We have boilers and installation offers for every budget. Just order online or talk to our team of heating experts.

QUICK & MESS-FREE INSTALLATION

Our chaps are friendly, familiar, right on time, and will walk you through what the job involves and how they will go about it and take away old boiler & all leftovers on completion.

EXCELLENT AFTER CARE

After completion It's not the end, we stay together & keep on assisting you with the annual boiler service or any tech helps you need. For anything else, we are just one call away.
Still wish to discuss anything about what you need? Call our helpline on 0300 303 0902 and get free advice without any obligations

Domestic And General Heating Limited is registered in England and Wales Company No-7060885, VAT registration No-994682260, Gas-Safe register no-226879.

The old-fashioned ways of heating industry were unfair on customers so we decided to change them by Removing the pushy salesperson's visits who try to sell you more than you need & increase their commission.
Here's a Domestic & General Heating way to save your
~ Preview ~

Answer Few Simple Questions

Just answer some simple questions about your home and existing heating system such as the current boiler type, number of bedrooms and showers & a few more.

This helps our intelligent system to figure out which type & what power boilers will be best suited for your home.

Once you’ve completed the online process, No site survey is needed. You’re all set for a hassle-free

Boiler Replacement.

Choose A Package

You’ll see a range of boilers recommended by us perfectly suited to your heating and hot water needs, Choose one by comparing brands and prices that suit your budget.

No extra or hidden costs. Everything is included within your boiler replacement cost. Removing the pushy salespeople from the process helps us to give you competitive & fixed prices.

Pick An Install Date

Once you’ve made your choice, select an installation date from the calendar that suits you best. Order before 4 pm & you can even choose the next day (subject to availability).

If you can’t find a suitable day on the calendar call our office on 0300 303 0902 to check if we can arrange.

Confirm Your Order

After selecting your boiler install date, choose a payment method you’d like to use to pay on completion. Then fill the required fields of our booking form with your name, email, phone number, boiler installation address & click Confirm Order button.

If you need any assistance ring us on 0300 303 0902

We Box Off Your Installation

Once you’ve confirmed your order our team will call you to double check on what you’ve ordered ensuring nothing is missed and will confirmed the name of engineer coming to fit your new boiler. We don’t use sub-contractors they are our own fitters.

Talk to our team if you require any additional material or services which are not a part of your quote.

On The Day

Our engineers arrive with all ordered materials so there is no time wasted waiting for unnecessary deliveries.

Our Chap’s are friendly, familiar, right on time, and will walk you through what the job involves and how they’ll go about it. So you can relax and leave it to them.

Once the job is done and dusted, they’ll take away your old product as well as any debris from the site.

You Pay & Receive

Once the job is complete & your new boiler is tested to current standards, our engineer will explain how to use your new boiler & controls.

Then you pay us using the method of payment you had selected during the ordering process.

Once payment is done, before leaving our engineer with issue & handover gas safe certificate along with boiler book and other installation documents signed by him.

Quality Checks & We Follow up

Whilst you enjoy the comforts of your new boiler our team members audits the engineer’s full report with images submitted for quality checks. We do it to make sure our good quality promise is delivered.

Your feedback is as important as getting business from you. You’ll receive a call after a few days to check and make sure you stay happy & warm.
Sounds Too Good To Be True? Is There Any Catch?
We Are Committed To Deliver What We Promise.

For Good, we just changed the way people used to buy boilers. Now you have a choice to make, get the same boiler at a fair & fixed price, or waste your hard-earned money by paying extra to someone sitting next to you & enjoying a cup of tea at your expense?
~ Preview ~
~ Preview ~
~ Preview ~

DETERMINED PAST

A family ran business founded By Mr. A Tariq started its journey in 2009. A visionary who worked tirelessly with his team to reach out to customers with better options. Under his guidance company bagged many compliance certifications of FCA, Gas-safe, Sustainable Energy Technologies, MCS, PAS2030, Green deal, and Energy Company Obligation (ECO) assessors & providers. Things got serious by 2012 as the company stepped into joint ventures with major green deal providers, working along with Energy Giants EDF and EON installing A-Rated condensing boilers to reduce carbon footprints under the Govt funded ECO scheme. With a consistent growth, the company achieved another landmark by shaking hands with Worcester Bosch Thermotechnologies Uk’s leading boiler manufacturer, and kept on working with the representatives & team of engineers successfully satisfying customers, landlords, and housing societies both in the domestic and commercial sectors providing top-notch heating solutions.

PROMISING FUTURE

In 2017, A young & experienced engineer Mr. Shahab Gulfam took over as Managing Director. He was concerned and a bit uncomfortable with old fashioned ways of this industry, according to him customers were being overcharged due to the overheads of salesmen and extra staff to chase them, and started looking for a better customer-focused solution. Having Decided that he teamed up with Mr. S Murtaza ( Engineering Designs ) & Mr. Kamran ( IT ) & used his field experience to successfully design & develop an online intelligent system. He didn’t want to play with a few cards short in a deck and the system was put live for testing in Jan 2018. He knew it will take a while to bring perfection and with serious hard work & team effort we now in 2021 Proudly Say We Have Nailed It. This is not an end it’s the beginning of a new era of heating. Our team is committed to putting all their efforts and experience into developing better solutions in the coming future.

Little We Knew Years Ago We Would Order Food, Book Taxis & More Using Apps On Our Phones.

Technology brought a change to make lives better & easier.

Our online intelligent tool is designed to deliver the same for you.
From buying a boiler online to installation, we made everything as simple and efficient as one can imagine.


Find Out More

We followed the trend and rated excellent on the Trustpilot, But we also say Seeing is Believing.
Please check out some pictures of top-quality workmanship delivered by our in-house professionals.
These are genuine on-site clicks of the boilers installed by our professionals. We are committed to delivering, what we display.
Our customers trust made it possible and we hope soon your new boiler install pics will be listed here.

Need Help or Advice?

We Understand that choosing a new boiler is a big decision and Listening to our customers is at the very heart of D&G Heating. Please choose the option that suits you best, so we can help you with your inquiry.
It is quick and easy to fit into your schedule. Available from 6 a.m. to 11 p.m., with a typical response time of less than 30 seconds.
